fields.Title of Work: "All the Ages of a Human Being"<br><br>Granta Magazine<span style="color:#222222;font-size:16px;"> presented at the Frankfurt Book Fair 2022.<br><br></span>Granta Magazine<span style="color:#222222;font-size:16px;">’s 24-volume, </span>Poéticas del Lenguage, <span style="color:#222222;font-size:16px;">highlights fifteen voices belonging to different generations and geographies within Spain's multilingual literary map. </span>Poéticas del Lenguage<span style="color:#222222;font-size:16px;"> </span><span style="color:#222222;font-size:16px;">is a special volume that celebrates the richness of the unique cosmology revealed by Basque, Catalan, Galician, Spanish, Valencian, and Asturian.</span>
